summary: SummaryMEDIHEAL Phyto-enzyme Peeling Pad exfoliates and resurfaces skin, lifting away dead skin cells for soft, smooth skin. This non-abrasive treatment gently boosts your skin's natural exfoliation process to reduce the signs of aging and improve the appearance of pores.
details: DetailsBenefitsImproves skin exfoliation by 93%Reduces blackheads by 66%Visibly improves pores by 27%FeaturesDual-sided padEmbossed textured side for enhanced exfoliationSmooth side for gentle exfoliation in sensitive areasSized (2.6") to cover a wide areaRounded corners for a perfect fit on skinKey IngredientsNatural Papaya Enzyme from the superfood that is rich in antioxidants and dissolves dead skin cellsLipohydroxy Acid (LHA) works on the surface of the skin and has a larger molecule size compared to AHA, making it less irritatingItem 2626996How To UseAs a treatment mask: Apply on targeted areas (forehead, cheeks and chin) after cleansing for an intensive treatment. Leave on for 15 minutes, remove and let the remaining serum absorb into skin.As a treatment pad: After cleansing, gently swipe across skin to tone, moisturize and prep skin. Can be used daily both in the AM and PM.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine Salicylate, Betaine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Tromethamine, Octyldodeceth-16, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Papain. Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Junipers Virginiana Oil, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Artemisia Vulgaris Oil, Beta-Glucan, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil.
how_to_use: As a treatment mask: Apply on targeted areas (forehead, cheeks and chin) after cleansing for an intensive treatment. Leave on for 15 minutes, remove and let the remaining serum absorb into skin.As a treatment pad: After cleansing, gently swipe across skin to tone, moisturize and prep skin. Can be used daily both in the AM and PM.

reviews.headline: Amazing!!!
reviews.comments: Literlly the best thing ive ever used! Ive not broken out since ive been using & my skin is so smooth!!

reviews.headline: What a great product!
reviews.comments: The pads are perfectly saturated to use on face and neck; the solution is smooth and comforting to my skin and using once daily I saw some minor peeling but my skin felt so soft and pores were smaller. Love the packaging that comes with a tweezer in the cap to use to pick up the pads

reviews.headline: Sadly wasn't impressed..
reviews.comments: when i found these toner pads i was so excited to ise them bc i was getting really bad texture on my face. While these pads felt amazing and refreshing on my skin i didnt  see a difference/improvement. :/ i dont think ill be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: A Winner for my skin
reviews.comments: I started getting dark spots on my face, which is not a good look, so I found these guys, and after using them for 3 weeks, my dark spots are seriously almost gone. I use a dark spot corrector along with it and I couldn't be happier.  My skin looks absolutely radiant again.

reviews.headline: Quick results
reviews.comments: I originally got these for some texture i started seeing on my chin and between my eyebrows. And i quickly ended up ditching my skincare routine and just started using these dailys. Omg the results were quick and my skin is glowy, texture is minimal. Will continue to buy this product

reviews.headline: I wanted to love this
reviews.comments:
i see so many good reviews and ive always used the Blemish pads box but this one really gave me an allergic reaction and i know it was that bc i made sure to cut the pad in half n just swipe in my problem/pore areas and instanstly after finishing my routine i waa itchy in the same areas. 
I have combo sensitive skin

reviews.headline: I wanted to love this
reviews.comments:
i see so many good reviews and ive always used the Blemish pads box but this one really gave me an allergic reaction and i know it was that bc i made sure to cut the pad in half n just swipe in my problem/pore areas and instanstly after finishing my routine i waa itchy in the same areas. 
I have combo sensitive skin

reviews.headline: YES, THEY WORK.  BUY THEM!
reviews.comments: On my 3rd box of these toner pads and when I get halfway through a box I order a new one so i don't run out.  I use them EVERYDAY, 2x a day WITH SUNSCREEN! They are GREAT at resurfacing the skin and clearing blemishes and hyperpigmentation.

reviews.headline: Noticeably smoother skin and makeup application
reviews.comments: I use these first to remove makeup and then I follow with the Mediheal Vitamide pads in the yellow box. It's been a few weeks and my face is much softer and smoother. I previously could not use powder foundation because my skin just wrinkled up and looked bumpy. Powder actually works on me now. good quality product for the price. easy to use and smells nice.

reviews.headline: Perfect addition
reviews.comments:
I feel like every week on TikTok there's a new crazy skincare product but this one is so good.  honestly, I like to keep my skin care kind of basic. I just use a regular Laroche Posey cleanser and the matching moisturizer, but I felt like my nose, 
specifically, was very clogged. I'm not prone to acne, but I do have very dry skin and I don't feel like this stripped me. I honestly just feel like my skin has never been this bright it absorbed my moisturizer and serum extremely well 10 out of 10.

reviews.headline: I'm 48 who doesn't use fancy products
reviews.comments:
I'm 48 who doesn't buy fancy products and I love this stuff.  My skin looks dewy after a couple of weeks of using this.  My initial complaint was my makeup doesn't go on well and the makeup artist said this product will even out my skin texture. 
It did sting the first day and I did have a same breakout above my lip. After 2 weeks I noticed my skin is glowy and my skin looks clear. Makeup is going on well too.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I literally used one time and noticed a difference in my skin by the next day. It was smoother and brighter. by day three all the stubborn acne on my jaw and cheecks have cleared up and my skin looks plumped amd glowy. Ive never used a product that worked so quick!

reviews.headline: Really Nice!
reviews.comments: I have dry sensitive skin and was dealing with blackheads around the sides of my nose. The photo-enzyme peeling pads have really cleared up my blackheads and left my skin feeling super hydrated which causes additional breakouts or burning. I also love cutting the sheets and using to smooth side for a quick spot-treatment face mask every other night. The smell is a little medicinal, but doesn't still around long at all. Took a chance on these and really enjoy the results. Definitely a critical addition to a skincare routine for gentle exfoliation.

reviews.headline: Just get them!!
reviews.comments: I have only been using these toner pads for about a week and I can already see SUCH a noticeable difference in my skin! I had so many pimples on my chin and forehead/hairline area and even just using these every other day instead of both day & night, they are disappearing! You can also cut the pads in half because they are so big and they still give you the same result.

reviews.headline: Just get them!!
reviews.comments: I have only been using these toner pads for about a week and I can already see SUCH a noticeable difference in my skin! I had so many pimples on my chin and forehead/hairline area and even just using these every other day instead of both day & night, they are disappearing! You can also cut the pads in half because they are so big and they still give you the same result.

reviews.headline: amazing for congested skin
reviews.comments: i've been using this product for 2 years & it's AMAZING, my skin used to be so congested, and I had crazy fungal acne on my forehead, these pads literally show results within the next day. I wake up with SMOOTH GLOWING SKIN, one of my holy grail products as a licensed esthi. live laugh love mediheal!

reviews.headline: Smells AWFUL
reviews.comments: These things smell absolutely terrible. The best I can describe them as smelling like is fertilizer. I wish I would have known that before purchasing them. I haven't noticed much of an improvement in my skin since I started using them. They don't feel very astringent so I'm honestly not too sure if the "peeling pad" claim is true. My face feels slightly sticky after using them - like I used a toner pad or a serum. The smell doesn't linger, so if you're not sensitive to smells, you might be fine. I'm going to finish the container because it's not easy for me to return to Ulta - if it was I would definitely be returning them. I will NOT be repurchasing though.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: The struggle was real with blackheads! After 50 Years of them on my underarms. Nothing worked. This product did the job or is still doing the job.

reviews.headline: Refills
reviews.comments: I restock on these pads once every two months. They're intended to be refilled. It's a pillar of Korean skincare to reduce waste. Is there a reason Ulta doesn't sell the refills?

reviews.headline: obsessed
reviews.comments: i just started using this a week ago and the difference in my skin texture is crazy! my skin feels so smooth and my pores look smallerðŸ™Œ

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've only been using this product for 4 days and can already see a huge difference in my skin! Ive had some hormonal acne on my chin and jawline that wouldn't budge for the last two months and its finally starting to heal up! I used the product as a mask the first time to let it really sink in and the next day, I had several tiny blackheads surface and come out when I touched my skin. A few under the surface zits also came to a head. My skin looks glowy and I'm really looking forward to long term results! 

I do agree with another reviewer's comments that the product leaves your skin a little sticky, but I think a follow up of moisturizer would get rid of it. Also, the tweezers in the box are a nice idea, but impractical. It's too difficult to just grab one pad quickly.
faceoff_positive.headline: Skin clearing!

faceoff_negative.comments: These things smell absolutely terrible. The best I can describe them as smelling like is fertilizer. I wish I would have known that before purchasing them. I haven't noticed much of an improvement in my skin since I started using them. They don't feel very astringent so I'm honestly not too sure if the "peeling pad" claim is true. My face feels slightly sticky after using them - like I used a toner pad or a serum. The smell doesn't linger, so if you're not sensitive to smells, you might be fine. I'm going to finish the container because it's not easy for me to return to Ulta - if it was I would definitely be returning them. I will NOT be repurchasing though.
faceoff_negative.headline: Smells AWFUL
